edu.ncsu.csc216.androtech.model.repair_center

Class TechDroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.androtech.model.repair_center.TechDroid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComDroid, ExpertDroid, VRDroid

    public abstract class TechDroid
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing the methods/data members of a tech-droid, which is use to repair communication or virtual reality devices
    Version:
    1.0 (
    Author:
    Adams Ombonga (amombong)

    • Field Detail

      • myDevice

        public Device myDevice
        Representation of the device that is used by the tech droid

    • Constructor Detail

      • TechDroid

        public TechDroid(java.lang.String suffix)
        Constructor used to create a service droid. The specific droid is created based on the suffix as well as the corresponding number. The next number is incremented
        Parameters:
        suffix - determines which kind of droid will be created, either a VRDroid, a ComDroid, or ExpertDroid

    • Method Detail

      • startDroidNumberingAt01

        public static void startDroidNumberingAt01()
        Method used to start the droid numbering at 01

      • getDroidID

        public java.lang.String getDroidID()
        Getter method used to get the full droid ID for this particular droid
        Returns:
        the droidID string representation of the droid

      • isAssigned

        public boolean isAssigned()
        Method used to determine if the droid is currently assigned a device for repair
        Returns:
        true/false if the current droid is assigned a device

      • release

        public Device release()
        Method used to release a device that has been repaired by a droid
        Returns:
        the device that was released

      • assign

        public void assign(Device device)
            throws DroidBusyException,
                   DroidDeviceMismatchException
        Method used to assign the next device to an appropriate service droid
        Parameters:
        device - the device to be assigned
        Throws:
        DroidBusyException - thrown if the droid is busy but someone is attempting to assign it a device
        DroidDeviceMismatchException - thrown if an incorrect device is attempted to be assigned to this droid

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method used to return the droid information as a string representation
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string with droid information
